Crayola the champion
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: ColorPandora: Crayola the champion
By torey_luvullo on Saturday, February 10, 2001 - 01:54 pm:

i got my courage up, and started raising a pure color pandora - right off the disc. 201 lif, and not much else - about a 680 or so composite. i figured i would raise this guy, find a good combo, get another and make that 2d gen cp the champ.

his early life didnt give me any reason to change that plan. he gained next to nothin in every drill except swim. with petit-trot encouraging me, i built up his def and tried my best to claw my way to another level in other stats.

around 5 1/2 yrs, he got a few bad weeks, and i figured he was coming out of a poor prime, so i gave him the golden peach. just out of habit, i then gave the silver at 6 1/2.

he is now 8, and he still is doing as good as ever. it looks like, in fact, i peached him too soon - he is getting gains as high as he's ever gotten right now! these guys seem to live forever.

i decided to concentrate on pow, and he does ok with it. he ko's no one, but no one ko's him. he loses to monsters who almost never beat me - goatrek and loveless, to name two - but he finds a way to win tourneys.

here are his stats:
lifpowintskispddef
644611154767758977


winslossesko's
47511

likes:potato/me dislikes:battle(!)

By Varthlokkur on Saturday, February 10, 2001 - 05:33 pm:

Excellent work, Torey! I don't think I ever got a ColorPandora up to 600 Power. I always work them towards Intelligence. Mainly for the Shotgun techniques. The ColorPandoras have a couple of other good INT techs, especially the Specials. Though I cannot remember them at teh moment.

Congrats on the good work!

Hey, raise a Pixie to combine with it and get a PeachTreeBug. Wooo HOOOO!!!

Varthlokkur

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, February 10, 2001 - 06:07 pm:

actually, i have an iced pixie, and dadge called it a fine combo - but the peach tree bug had bad stats and no techs - go figure!

By Eagle Fierce on Sunday, February 11, 2001 - 01:00 pm:

I think I know which techs you mean, Varth. One of my favorite techs in the game comes from the CP, "Delta Attack." "Spiral Rush" is also an int. based, I believe, and it does some hectic damage when it connects. In any case, I agree that CPs are mainly intelligence-based. The Liquid Cube might go either way, though and the Peach Tree Bug may not look so good, but don't wory about fighting with it, just feed it a star prume or two and take it on expedition :D They're natural diggers!
